justification: Offer ignores Team B’s zero-RB, consensus-trusting mindset and injury caution, and misestimates acceptance (B would snap-accept an elite RB for low-tier WR/TE depth). It frames only Team A’s needs and falsely claims a TE upgrade despite swapping a Tier 3 TE for a Tier 4. Rationale is generic and not grounded in roster tiers or B’s incentives.
